turbobarcam_anchor_adjust_params.description: Adjusts parameters for the Camera Anchor mode, such as transition duration. Actions can be 'add', 'set', or 'reset'.
turbobarcam_anchor_adjust_params.label: Adjust Anchor Params

turbobarcam_anchor_easing.description: Sets the easing function for camera anchor transitions, affecting the acceleration and deceleration of the movement.
turbobarcam_anchor_easing.label: Set Anchor Easing

turbobarcam_anchor_focus.description: Smoothly transitions the camera to a previously saved anchor point.
turbobarcam_anchor_focus.label: Focus Anchor

turbobarcam_anchor_focus_while_tracking.description: Transitions to a camera anchor while attempting to keep the currently tracked unit (if any from a compatible mode) in view. If no unit is tracked or mode is incompatible, behaves like 'Focus Anchor'.
turbobarcam_anchor_focus_while_tracking.label: Focus Anchor & Track

turbobarcam_anchor_load.description: Loads a set of camera anchor points from the storage, specific to the current map.
turbobarcam_anchor_load.label: Load Anchors
turbobarcam_anchor_load.parameters: `id` (string, identifier for the saved anchor set, e.g., `my_favorite_spots`)

turbobarcam_anchor_save.description: Saves the current set of camera anchor points to the storage, specific to the current map.
turbobarcam_anchor_save.label: Save Anchors
turbobarcam_anchor_save.parameters: `id` (string, identifier for saving the anchor set, e.g., `my_battle_views`)

turbobarcam_anchor_set.description: Saves the current camera position and state as a numbered anchor point.
turbobarcam_anchor_set.label: Set Anchor

turbobarcam_debug.description: Toggles the debug logging level for the widget, cycling through INFO, DEBUG, and TRACE levels.
turbobarcam_debug.label: Toggle Debug Log Level

turbobarcam_dev_config.description: Allows live modification of widget configuration values for development and tweaking. Use with caution as incorrect values can cause errors.
turbobarcam_dev_config.label: Dev: Change Config

turbobarcam_dev_reload.description: Hot reloads widget files without losing the current state, useful for development to apply code changes instantly.
turbobarcam_dev_reload.label: Dev: Reload Widget

turbobarcam_dollycam_add.description: Adds the current camera position as a new waypoint to the DollyCam route or edits the selected waypoint if in editor mode.
turbobarcam_dollycam_add.label: DollyCam: Add Waypoint

turbobarcam_dollycam_adjust_speed.description: Adjusts the navigation speed of the DollyCam when a route is active. Accepts values from -1.0 (full reverse) to 1.0 (full forward).
turbobarcam_dollycam_adjust_speed.label: DollyCam: Adjust Speed

turbobarcam_dollycam_edit_lookat.description: Sets the selected DollyCam waypoint to look at the currently selected unit. If no unit is selected, it might clear the look-at target.
turbobarcam_dollycam_edit_lookat.label: DollyCam: Set Waypoint LookAt

turbobarcam_dollycam_edit_speed.description: Sets the target speed for the selected waypoint in the DollyCam editor. Use '1' to reset to default speed.
turbobarcam_dollycam_edit_speed.label: DollyCam: Set Waypoint Speed
turbobarcam_dollycam_edit_speed.parameters: `speed_multiplier` (numeric, e.g., `0.5` for half speed, `2` for double speed, `1` to reset)

turbobarcam_dollycam_load.description: Loads a DollyCam route from the storage, specific to the current map.
turbobarcam_dollycam_load.label: DollyCam: Load Route
turbobarcam_dollycam_load.parameters: `name` (string, identifier of the route to load)

turbobarcam_dollycam_move_waypoint.description: Moves the currently selected DollyCam waypoint along a specified axis (X, Y, or Z) by a given amount when in editor mode.
turbobarcam_dollycam_move_waypoint.label: DollyCam: Move Waypoint

turbobarcam_dollycam_save.description: Saves the current DollyCam route to the storage, specific to the current map.
turbobarcam_dollycam_save.label: DollyCam: Save Route

turbobarcam_dollycam_test.description: Loads a predefined DollyCam route named 'test' for development or demonstration purposes.
turbobarcam_dollycam_test.label: DollyCam: Test Route

turbobarcam_dollycam_toggle_direction.description: Toggles the playback direction (forward/reverse) of the currently active DollyCam navigation.
turbobarcam_dollycam_toggle_direction.label: DollyCam: Toggle Direction

turbobarcam_dollycam_toggle_editor.description: Toggles the DollyCam waypoint editor mode on or off. Allows for creation and modification of camera paths.
turbobarcam_dollycam_toggle_editor.label: DollyCam: Toggle Editor

turbobarcam_dollycam_toggle_navigation.description: Starts or stops the DollyCam navigation along the currently defined route. Optionally can start without immediate camera control.
turbobarcam_dollycam_toggle_navigation.label: DollyCam: Toggle Navigation
turbobarcam_dollycam_toggle_navigation.parameters: `noCam` (optional boolean string: `true` to start without taking camera control, `false` or absent for normal start)

turbobarcam_fps_adjust_params.description: Adjusts parameters for the FPS Camera mode, such as camera offsets in peace/combat/weapon modes and mouse sensitivity. Actions can be 'add', 'set', or 'reset'.
turbobarcam_fps_adjust_params.label: Adjust FPS Params

turbobarcam_fps_clear_fixed_look_point.description: Clears any fixed look point or unit target that the FPS camera is currently focused on, returning to default forward view.
turbobarcam_fps_clear_fixed_look_point.label: FPS: Clear Look Point

turbobarcam_fps_clear_weapon_selection.description: Clears the currently selected weapon in FPS combat mode, stopping any specific weapon aiming.
turbobarcam_fps_clear_weapon_selection.label: FPS: Clear Weapon

turbobarcam_fps_next_weapon.description: Cycles to the next available weapon of the unit in FPS combat mode for aiming.
turbobarcam_fps_next_weapon.label: FPS: Next Weapon

turbobarcam_fps_set_fixed_look_point.description: Activates target selection mode. Click on a point on the map or a unit to make the FPS camera continuously look at that target while following the primary unit.
turbobarcam_fps_set_fixed_look_point.label: FPS: Set Look Point
turbobarcam_fps_set_fixed_look_point.parameters: None (activates UI command for map/unit click)

turbobarcam_fps_toggle_combat_mode.description: Toggles FPS combat mode, which may change camera offsets and enable weapon-specific aiming.
turbobarcam_fps_toggle_combat_mode.label: FPS: Toggle Combat Mode

turbobarcam_fps_toggle_free_cam.description: Toggles free camera mouse look in FPS mode, allowing manual control of the camera direction independent of unit heading.
turbobarcam_fps_toggle_free_cam.label: FPS: Toggle Free Cam

turbobarcam_group_tracking_adjust_params.description: Adjusts parameters for the Group Tracking Camera mode, such as camera distance, height, orbit offset, and smoothing factors. Actions can be 'add', 'set', or 'reset'.
turbobarcam_group_tracking_adjust_params.label: Adjust Group Track Params

turbobarcam_orbit_adjust_params.description: Adjusts parameters for the Orbit Camera mode, such as orbit height, distance, and rotation speed. Actions can be 'add', 'set', or 'reset'.
turbobarcam_orbit_adjust_params.label: Adjust Orbit Params

turbobarcam_orbit_load.description: Loads a saved orbit camera configuration (including target type, ID/position, speed, distance, height, angle, and paused state) for a specific ID, map-dependent.
turbobarcam_orbit_load.label: Load Orbit Config
turbobarcam_orbit_load.parameters: `orbitId` (string, identifier of the saved orbit configuration)

turbobarcam_orbit_save.description: Saves the current orbit camera configuration (target, parameters, and state) to a specified ID, map-dependent.
turbobarcam_orbit_save.label: Save Orbit Config
turbobarcam_orbit_save.parameters: `orbitId` (string, identifier to save the orbit configuration)

turbobarcam_orbit_toggle.description: Toggles the Orbit Camera mode for the selected unit. If already orbiting the unit, it disables the mode.
turbobarcam_orbit_toggle.label: Toggle Orbit Camera (Unit)

turbobarcam_orbit_toggle_pause.description: Toggles pausing and resuming the camera's movement in Orbit Camera mode.
turbobarcam_orbit_toggle_pause.label: Toggle Orbit Pause

turbobarcam_orbit_toggle_point.description: Toggles the Orbit Camera mode around a point on the map (cursor position).
turbobarcam_orbit_toggle_point.label: Toggle Orbit Camera (Point)

turbobarcam_overview_change_height.description: Changes the height level of the Overview Camera by a given amount (positive to zoom out, negative to zoom in) and moves the camera to maintain focus.
turbobarcam_overview_change_height.label: Overview: Change Height
turbobarcam_overview_change_height.parameters: `amount` (numeric, e.g., `1` to increase height level, `-1` to decrease)

turbobarcam_overview_move_camera.description: Moves the Overview Camera to focus on the current cursor position on the map. Typically used with mouse bindings.
turbobarcam_overview_move_camera.label: Overview: Move to Cursor

turbobarcam_overview_toggle.description: Toggles the Overview Camera mode, providing a top-down strategic view. Focuses on selected unit or cursor position.
turbobarcam_overview_toggle.label: Toggle Overview Camera

turbobarcam_projectile_adjust_params.description: Adjusts parameters for the Projectile Camera mode, such as camera distance, height, and look-ahead factor. Actions can be 'add', 'set', or 'reset'.
turbobarcam_projectile_adjust_params.label: Adjust Projectile Cam Params

turbobarcam_projectile_camera_follow.description: Activates Projectile Camera in 'follow' sub-mode. The camera moves with the projectile, attempting to keep it in frame.
turbobarcam_projectile_camera_follow.label: Follow Projectile (Moving Cam)
turbobarcam_projectile_camera_follow.parameters: None (tracks projectile from currently watched/selected unit)

turbobarcam_projectile_camera_track.description: Activates Projectile Camera in 'static' sub-mode. The camera stays at its initial position and rotates to track the projectile.
turbobarcam_projectile_camera_track.label: Track Projectile (Static Cam)
turbobarcam_projectile_camera_track.parameters: None (tracks projectile from currently watched/selected unit)

turbobarcam_set_fov.description: Sets the camera's Field of View (FOV) to a specific value.
turbobarcam_set_fov.label: Set FOV

turbobarcam_spec_unit_group.description: Manages spectator unit groups. Allows setting a group with selected units, selecting units from a group, or clearing a group. Requires spectator mode.
turbobarcam_spec_unit_group.label: Spectator Unit Group

turbobarcam_stop_tracking.description: Disables any active TurboBarCam tracking mode (FPS, Orbit, Unit Track, Group Track, etc.) and returns to default camera control.
turbobarcam_stop_tracking.label: Stop Camera Tracking

turbobarcam_toggle.description: Toggles the entire TurboBarCam widget on or off.
turbobarcam_toggle.label: Toggle TurboBarCam

turbobarcam_toggle_fps_camera.description: Toggles FPS camera mode. Attaches the camera to the currently selected unit. If already in FPS mode for that unit, it disables it.
turbobarcam_toggle_fps_camera.label: Toggle FPS Camera

turbobarcam_toggle_group_tracking_camera.description: Toggles the Group Tracking Camera mode. Tracks the center of mass of the currently selected units. If already tracking, it disables the mode.
turbobarcam_toggle_group_tracking_camera.label: Toggle Group Tracking

turbobarcam_toggle_playercam_selection.description: Toggles whether unit selection is locked or follows the spectated player's selection when the game's Player Camera view is active.
turbobarcam_toggle_playercam_selection.label: Toggle PlayerCam Selection Lock

turbobarcam_toggle_require_unit_selectio.description: Toggles whether unit tracking modes (like FPS, Orbit) can remain active even if no unit is currently selected. If this is disabled (default), tracking usually stops shortly after deselecting the unit.
turbobarcam_toggle_require_unit_selectio.label: Toggle Require Unit Selection for Tracking

turbobarcam_toggle_tracking_camera.description: Toggles the Unit Tracking Camera mode. Follows the selected unit while attempting to maintain the current camera angle and distance, smoothly adjusting to unit movements.
turbobarcam_toggle_tracking_camera.label: Toggle Unit Tracking

turbobarcam_toggle_zoom.description: Cycles through predefined Field of View (FOV) values, effectively zooming the camera in or out.
turbobarcam_toggle_zoom.label: Toggle Zoom (FOV)

turbobarcam_tracking_camera_adjust_param.description: Adjusts parameters for the Unit Tracking Camera, primarily the vertical height offset at which the camera looks towards the unit. Actions can be 'add', 'set', or 'reset'.
turbobarcam_tracking_camera_adjust_param.label: Adjust Unit Track Params
